properties.name: Bloedel Reserve Creative Residency
properties.address: 7571 NE Dolphin Dr, Bainbridge Island, WA 98110
properties.description: Multi-week residency on Bainbridge Island that offers writers an opportunity to explore the connection between humans and the environment.

properties.name: Seattle Civic Poet
properties.description: Two-year residency to act as a cultural ambassador and to foster community dialogue.

properties.name: Seattle Youth Poet Laureate
properties.description: A program of Seattle Arts & Lectures, the YPL program offers youth writers and leaders the opportunity to share their voices as well as publish a poetry collection.

properties.name: The Seventh Wave
properties.description: Arts and literary digital magazine and residency program that invites writers, artists, activists, and creators to take part in a conversation surrounding the most pressing social issues of our times.

properties.name: Short Run Comix and Arts
properties.description: Literary nonprofit that hosts an annual comix festival, residency program, and educational workshops.
